title: Properties of a District System object
description: Schema for a District System object

id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to.

source_name.description: Name of the original data source.

source_id.description: Id of the feature in original data source.

lengths.description: Length of each segment in ft, generated on export.

total_length.description: Total length of the connector in ft, generated on export.

start_junction_id.description: Id of the junction that this connector starts at.

fluid_temperature_type.description: Classification of temperature range of fluid in this connector

flow_direction.description: Charcterization of connector, relative to the central plant
